content.question: In the 1930â€™s one of the effects of the Great Depression in Europe was

choices.label: a reconciliation between communists and fascists in France
a strengthening of efforts to facilitate international trade
a rise in the production of consumer goods
the increased effectiveness of the League of Nations in international relations
the broadening of popular support for the Nazi party in Germany

content.answer: the broadening of popular support for the Nazi party in Germany

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
